Legal_Issue: Failure to assess objective risk based on updated country conditions
Application_Facts: Jama, a Somali citizen and member of a minority clan, claimed past persecution and faces risks as a young, westernized male returning to al-Shabaab-controlled Kismayo
Court_Ruling: Federal Court allowed judicial review, set aside the decision
Claimant_Status: Somali citizen, minority clan member, potential returnee
Defendant_Behavior: PRRA officer failed to consider recent publicly available country condition reports
Grounds_for_Claim: Objective risk due to identity and profile in origin country
Legal_Standard: Officers must assess risk using current country conditions, even if not raised by applicant
Assessment_Factor: Risk to 'westernized' Somalis in al-Shabaab-controlled areas
Procedural_Issue: Failure to proactively assess updated evidence
Evidence_Used: Recent reports on security conditions in Somalia, particularly Kismayo
Legal_Provision_Cited: IRPA provisions on risk assessment in PRRA
Application_Basis: Personal risk profile based on clan, background, and Westernization
Evidence_Assessed: Publicly available documentation on country conditions
Relief_Sought: Redetermination of PRRA by a different officer
Governing_Rule: PRRA officers have a duty to consider current country conditions
Evidentiary_Deficiency: Officer did not consider recent, relevant country reports
Outcome: Decision set aside; remitted for redetermination
Harm_Assessment: Risk of persecution or harm upon return to Kismayo
Cause_Description: Jama's profile as a young, westernized male from a minority clan in al-Shabaab-controlled area poses significant risk
Evidence_Handling: Failure to incorporate readily available public reports into risk assessment
Legal_Provision_Violated: IRPA s. 107(1) - obligation to assess risk based on up-to-date information
Evidence_Issues: Omission of recent, credible country condition evidence
Evidence_Assessment: Inadequate assessment of objective risk factors
Decision_Rationale: Officer erred by not applying current country condition data to claimantâ€™s personal circumstances
Decision_Making_Body: Immigration, Refugees and Citizenship Canada (IRCC) - PRRA Unit
Evidentiary_Issues: Failure to consider relevant, publicly available documentation
Legal_Standard_Applied: Duty of fairness and obligation to consider all relevant risk factors
